ygData.subject: Ok...(question at bottom of this)
ygData.msgSnippet: I went to South Ro and hit the Derv camps. I got a CRAP load of water and gold that s about all. I was thinking of forming a praty and going to Lesser Fay. to
ygData.messageBody:
I went to South Ro and hit the Derv camps. I got
a CRAP load of water and gold that's about all. I
was thinking of forming a praty and going to Lesser
Fay. to camp an orc camp, good idea or bad? I was also
wondering what skills you need to make banded armor, I am
skill 71 at taloring. I would like to know so I can
make some.<br><br>Winolian<br>Bard of the 10th song
(no not really didn't buy my 10th yet :-) I
will)<br>Bertox
